verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> you sit <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H3898><s%> with a ruler, <S%H4910><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> diligently what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you:
And put <S%H7760><s%> a knife <S%H7915><s%> to your throat, <S%H3930><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you be a man <S%H1167><s%> given <S%H1167><s%> to appetite. <S%H5315><s%>
Be not desirous <S%H183><s%> of his dainties: <S%H4303><s%> for they are deceitful <S%H3577><s%> meat. <S%H3899><s%>
Labor <S%H3021><s%> not to be rich: <S%H6238><s%> cease <S%H2308><s%> from your own wisdom. <S%H998><s%>

Will you set <S%H5774><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> on that which is not? for riches certainly make <S%H6213><s%> themselves wings; <S%H3671><s%> they fly <S%H5774><s%> away as an eagle <S%H5404><s%> toward heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Eat <S%H3898><s%> you not the bread <S%H3899><s%> of him that has an evil <S%H7451><s%> eye, <S%H5869><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> desire <S%H183><s%> you his dainty <S%H4303><s%> meats:
For as he thinks <S%H8176><s%> in his heart, <S%H5315><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> is he: Eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> said <S%H559><s%> he to you; but his heart <S%H3820><s%> is not with you.
The morsel <S%H6595><s%> which you have eaten <S%H398><s%> shall you vomit <S%H6958><s%> up, and lose <S%H7843><s%> your sweet <S%H5273><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>
Speak <S%H1696><s%> not in the ears <S%H241><s%> of a fool: <S%H3684><s%> for he will despise <S%H936><s%> the wisdom <S%H7922><s%> of your words. <S%H4405><s%>
Remove <S%H5253><s%> not the old <S%H5769><s%> landmark; <S%H1366><s%> and enter <S%H935><s%> not into the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the fatherless: <S%H3490><s%>
For their redeemer <S%H1350><s%> is mighty; <S%H2389><s%> he shall plead <S%H7378><s%> their cause <S%H7379><s%> with you.
Apply <S%H935><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> to instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and your ears <S%H241><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not correction <S%H4148><s%> from the child: <S%H5288><s%> for if you beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>
You shall beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from hell. <S%H7585><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> if <S%H518><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> be wise, <S%H2449><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> mine. <S%H589><s%>
Yes, my reins <S%H3629><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H5937><s%> when your lips <S%H8193><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> right <S%H4339><s%> things.
Let not your heart <S%H3820><s%> envy <S%H7065><s%> sinners: <S%H2400><s%> but be you in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long.
For surely there is an end; <S%H319><s%> and your expectation <S%H8615><s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> you, my son, <S%H1121><s%> and be wise, <S%H2449><s%> and guide <S%H833><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
Be not among winebibbers; <S%H5433><s%> <S%H3196><s%> among riotous <S%H2151><s%> eaters <S%H2151><s%> of flesh: <S%H1320><s%>
For the drunkard <S%H5435><s%> and the glutton <S%H2151><s%> shall come to poverty: <S%H3423><s%> and drowsiness <S%H5124><s%> shall clothe <S%H3847><s%> a man with rags. <S%H7168><s%>
Listen <S%H8085><s%> to your father <S%H1><s%> that begat <S%H3205><s%> you, and despise <S%H936><s%> not your mother <S%H517><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> she is old. <S%H2204><s%>
Buy <S%H7069><s%> the truth, <S%H571><s%> and sell <S%H4376><s%> it not; also wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and understanding. <S%H998><s%>
The father <S%H1><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall greatly rejoice: <S%H1523><s%> and he that begets <S%H3205><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> child shall have joy <S%H8056><s%> of him.
Your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%> shall be glad, <S%H8056><s%> and she that bore <S%H3205><s%> you shall rejoice. <S%H1523><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me your heart, <S%H3820><s%> and let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> observe <S%H5341><s%> my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For a whore <S%H2181><s%> is a deep <S%H6013><s%> ditch; <S%H7745><s%> and a strange <S%H5237><s%> woman is a narrow <S%H6862><s%> pit. <S%H875><s%>
She also <S%H637><s%> lies in wait <S%H693><s%> as for a prey, <S%H2863><s%> and increases <S%H3254><s%> the transgressors <S%H898><s%> among men. <S%H120><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> has woe? <S%H188><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has sorrow? <S%H17><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has contentions? <S%H4079><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has babbling? <S%H7879><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has wounds <S%H6482><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause? <S%H2600><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has redness <S%H2448><s%> of eyes? <S%H5869><s%>
They that tarry <S%H309><s%> long at <S%H5921><s%> the wine; <S%H3196><s%> they that go <S%H935><s%> to seek <S%H2713><s%> mixed <S%H4469><s%> wine. <S%H4469><s%>

Look <S%H7200><s%> not you on the wine <S%H3196><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it is red, <S%H119><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it gives <S%H5414><s%> his color <S%H5869><s%> in the cup, <S%H3599><s%> when it moves <S%H1980><s%> itself aright. <S%H4339><s%>
At the last <S%H319><s%> it bites <S%H5391><s%> like a serpent, <S%H5175><s%> and stings <S%H6567><s%> like an adder. <S%H6848><s%>
Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> women, and your heart <S%H3820><s%> shall utter <S%H1696><s%> perverse <S%H8419><s%> things.

Yes, you shall be as he that lies <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> in the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> or as he that lies <S%H7901><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of a mast. <S%H2260><s%>

They have stricken <S%H5221><s%> me, shall you say, and I was not sick; <S%H2470><s%> they have beaten <S%H1986><s%> me, and I felt <S%H3045><s%> it not: when <S%H4970><s%> shall I awake? <S%H6974><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> it yet again. <S%H5750><s%>
